answers.text:
Hi Michael, 
I found a great volunteer-related document when I looked on the Knowledge Network!
A volunteer handbook from the City of Roseville, California. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301772/Volunteer_Handbook
I hope this helps!
Best, 
Jim

author: Michael Maniscalco
text: Does anyone have a volunteer handbook for Council, Commission and Board members? I am thinking of creating something along the same line as an employee handbook with policies and protocols but focused on our Towns Volunteers.
title: Volunteer handbook
